items.sentence: What are you going to do the rest of the day?
Well, I guess I would've done the same thing.
Tom didn't let Mary see what was in his hand.
Did you know that Tom and John were brothers?
It was sweet of you to ask Mary to the dance.
A sentence normally has a subject and a verb.
You have to pay 10,000 yen extra on holidays.
The room is very cold. The fire has gone out.
It's imperative that you arrive here on time.
What was the last book you read just for fun?
